item.title: E-Courses (DataCamp)
item.description: DataCamp provides access to e-courses. These are mandatory preparation.

item.title: Literature/appendix
item.description: Relevant literature and references for further reading can be found here (updated continuously). VanderPlas, Jake 2016: Python Data Science Handbook. Essential Tools for Working with Data. O’Reily Media Entire book can be accessed online via: https://jakevdp.

item.title: Course schedule
item.description: The schedule for the course with links to the relevant notebooks
